1149260.name: Ambient DM DLC - (Music) Fantastical
1149260.description:
Traveling in a fantasy world will bring you to some fantastical places. Be prepared for these places with this full album release! Intense, Exciting and Dramatic are some great ways to describe this Music Pack.

  • 25 New Full Length Songs are Included
  • All songs can have their Tempo changed making nearly unlimited variations!

Tracks

  • Grove Entrance
  • Forgotten Forest
  • Deep Whispering
  • Wisps Story
  • Peaceful Night
  • Fragment
  • Sleeping Unicorns
  • White Deer
  • Forest Fireflies
  • Flower of Life
  • Sea Travel
  • Castle Outpost
  • Deep Cave
  • Fantastical Garden
  • Final Battle
  • First Battle
  • Ghost Town
  • Harbor
  • Castle Interior
  • Welcome
  • Magical Forest
  • Middle Town
  • Peaceful Forest
  • Small Village
  • Spirit Grave

Enough reading about it, the video contains (15 second) clips from each song in this pack.
1149260.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
